mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (id, name, grade, math, english, sport, policy, java, c_plus_plus, algorithm, score, average) VALUES (#{id}, #{name},#{grade},#{math}, #{english},#{sport},#{policy},#{java}, #{c_plus_plus},#{algorithm},#{score},#{average})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET math = #{math}, english = #{english}, sport = #{sport}, policy = #{policy}, java = #{java}, c_plus_plus = #{cPlusPlus}, algorithm = #{algorithm}, score = #{score}, average = #{average} WHERE id = #{id}
